General.Name: Grupo Minsa S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Minsa, S.A.B. de C.V. produces, distributes, and sells nixtamalized cornmeal under the MINSAA brand name in Mexico. The company sells packaged corn and corn flour to mills, small producers, and industrialists. Its products are used to produce tortillas and other food products. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Tlalnepantla de Baz, Mexico. Grupo Minsa, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Promotora Empresarial de Occidente SA de CV.
General.Address: Avenida Prolongacion Toltecas No. 4, Tlalnepantla de Baz, EM, Mexico, 54090

7.Name: Mr. José Ernesto  Cacho Ribeiro
